short_summary: Request for standing offer for construction services - mechanical standing offer
description: Request for standing offer for construction services - mechanical standing offer
full_summary:
# EZ899-231734: Construction Services - Mechanical Standing Offer

### Invitation to Bid ( call for tenders )

A standing offer for mechanical construction services is being solicited for the Correctional Service Canada (CSC) institutions listed below. 

### Scope of Work

This solicitation aims to procure a contractor to perform low dollar construction, maintenance, and repair work on a "as and when requested" basis for the following CSC institutions:

* Mission Medium Institution, Mission BC
* Mission Minimum Institution, Mission BC
* Mountain Institution, Agassiz BC
* Kent Institution, Agassiz BC
* Kwìkwèxwelhp Healing Village, Harrison Mills BC
* Matsqui Institution, Abbotsford BC
* Pacific Institution, Abbotsford BC
* Fraser Valley Institution, Abbotsford BC
* Chilliwack Community Corrections Centre, Chilliwack BC

### Tender Details

- Tender Number: EZ899-231734
- Publication Date: 2023-04-25
- Tender Closing Date: 2023-05-26, 14:00:00
- Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-05-26
- Expected Contract End Date: TBC

### Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact:
Serdar Eskicakit, SPAC/PSPC
serdar.eskicakit@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL 
Access the full solicitation at the following website: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16098242?extsite=MTYwOTgyNDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Trade Agreements

This tender complies with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and will be awarded to the most competitive bidder.

### Procurement Method

The procurement method for this standing offer is open bidding, and the contractor selection will be based on a combined rating of Technical Merit and Price. Get more check stats in the full solicitation package.
